Author: brlewis
Content:
On ourdoings.com I've only ever had one error that could wipe out user-created data, and it would not have been caught by unit testing.

On the other hand, if I knew of a great tool for automated page tests I would use it. I don't think creation of such tests should be hard.

Author: cmars232
Content:
The exception to this article's premise would be subreddits, like programming. Niche groups like programming.reddit or del.icio.us do feel like they have a higher signal-to-noise ratio. I've gotten some great links from programming.reddit, or here, for example.

Main reddit is where I go when I'm bored and procrastinating.

Author: pg
Content: Yeah, maybe I'll leave the navigational structure at least.

Content: Thanks for the reminder, I didn't even realize there were profiles on news.yc!

Author: brlewis
Content: I think you must be thinking of a different kind of school.  The results for my kids have been clearly better than at a regular school, and they are clearly enjoying creativity, not being overly pressured.
